
list1 = "abcdefghij"
print list1[:-1]	# remove the last character -  abcdefghi
print list1[1:]		# remove the first character - bcdefghij

Apriori impl√©mentation
- can only handle itemsets of max. length of 3
- counter k was not used
- 3 different dictionaries are used for 3 sets of itemsets based on their length
